name: Amagon Ark
description:
You work at a distribution center in the intergalactic Amagon Ark 2402 in the Proxima Centauri star system.

Amagon Ark holds every fauna DNA sample in existence and is able to distribute them by parts for whatever reason these are needed. Amagon does not ask questions or pass judgement, we only accept orders and payment*. Your job as a hivemind is to control the clones and distribute correct DNA samples across the Universe. As we have perfected the delivery system over many centuries, time and space on Amagon Ark works a bit differently.

Clones are not allowed to touch other clones.

Amagon Prime Minister Jeff appreciates your productivity and confidentiality.

 

*Bitcoin is also accepted as a valid payment method

 

Made for Scorejam #16.

Check your order on the aPad, download body part DNA from the aTerminals and return to your pod. If the time runs out you lose. If you touch other clones, you will return to your pod and start the round again, but the timer does not reset. 

Good luck!

CONTROLS

  • W A S D - Movement
  • Left Shift - Sprint
  • E - Interact
  • SPACE - Dash
  • Esc - Pause Menu
